author: TheSkiF4er
name: ProdStarterHub - Node Express API
shortDescription: A production-ready Node.js + Express template with structured logging, Prometheus metrics, health checks, and best-practice defaults.

ProjectName.description: The project name (used for package.json name and docker image tags).

Company.description: Company or organization name used in docs and metadata.

NodeVersion.description: Major Node.js version to target for engines and Docker base image.

IncludeDocker.description: Include production-ready multi-stage Dockerfile and docker-compose for local development.

IncludeKubernetesManifests.description: Include basic Kubernetes manifests and Helm chart scaffold.

IncludeBullMQ.description: Include BullMQ worker scaffolding and example jobs for background processing.

IncludeOpenTelemetry.description: Include OpenTelemetry bootstrap/config and example exporter configuration.

IncludeGithubActions.description: Include GitHub Actions workflows for CI (lint/test/build) and optional image publish.

IncludeTests.description: Include test scaffold and example unit/integration tests (jest + supertest).

manualInstructions.text: Run 'npm ci' or 'npm install' in the project root to install dependencies.

postActions.description: Initialize a git repository and perform initial commit

manualInstructions.text: Run 'git init && git add . && git commit -m "Initial scaffold from ProdStarterHub Node Express template"'

args.args: -lc "git init && git add . && git commit -m 'Initial scaffold from ProdStarterHub Node Express template' || true"

symbolsHelp.description: Customize project generation. Typical usage: copy the template folder and replace placeholders or integrate with your template engine.
usageExamples:
# Copy template folder and rename
cp -R prodstarter-express myservice && cd myservice

# Install deps and run
npm ci && npm start
